item.title: Zaatar
item.description: This is a traditional Palestinian-Lebanese way of making Zaatar. It can be then eaten by dipping bread in olive oil and in the Zaatar or as part of another recipe. Will hold for a long time in the pantry. This recipe scales for larger amounts so long you preserve the ratios. Ingredients 1 Cup Zaatar leaves (without the stalks), cleaned and dried. 1 Cup sesame (optionally roasted). 1 Cup Sumac.
